_sText:
It is translated by PROMT

Greetings to all


This space introspection attempt...

As created and playing in the footsteps of the created....

This space living under the laws....
It does not try to destroy you... It simply moves as it is necessary for it

Though can sometimes seem that it specially for you pursues or helps.....


Open the consciousness relax also you you will see forces which operate subjects on a map....

This map is meditation space for consciousness existence...



Would use ramps what to take cover behind them...

Use spheres (Guard Balls) as protection with a side and which it is possible to direct the weapon on butts

Do not think of the bad

Not all butts are equally strong
Among them there is a dangerous hissing... Be careful of its force

The map contains secrets...

Are treated at a turtle....


Kill all butts and spheres....

Drink milk.....

Burn the weapon in the terminal.... On two for session

And to you the way to a record player and light mandala will be opened..... Pray and think for the higher.....

Go to a corridor of light and remain there for ever.....
There game comes to an end

The triangle is safe..... It can to be touched


Inspectors will give you the weapon and the device of a stop of force

The device of a stop of force the winchester..... Works only three times

The device of a stop of force not stops all at once....

Use given rationally.....

The most safe place in the centre in movement

Always know position of spheres... They are more predicted....
Spheres like to be gone slowly for a back....



This map is created as a result of tests of game process lasting many hours and several years of studying of the world


The dancing monk to pray for you.....




INSTALLATION
.....................................................................................................
Include scale correction in game options



Put->

   Maps - a map with structures. Models and sounds
   Resources - temporarily copy or replace the (it for text display)..... Unessentially
   infinitylight_1.raw - Effect of correction of scale..... It is desirable
   so3_gas1.raw - Effect of correction of scale..... It is desirable

In

Steam\SteamApps\....... Your account.....\counter-strike source\cstrike

....................................................................................................



The map contains special models... Structures.... Music... And sounds.... Developed for it....

You can execute this map very quickly.... And can play for hours and hours and it to turn out nothing

All will depend on your status of consciousness...

After you will enter into a corridor of light game will independently be closed after a while...


Thanks for attention
